mapper.insert: insert into file_table (original_name, file_name, file_save_path, file_size, feed_id) values (#{original_name}, #{file_name}, #{file_save_path}, #{file_size}, #{feed_id})
mapper.select: select * from feed order by feed_id desc
mapper.insert: insert into comment(comment_feed_id, comment_user_id, comment_content) values (#{comment_feed_id}, #{comment_user_id}, #{comment_content})
mapper.select: select * from comment order by comment_created_at
